features.name: Wallet Authentication
features.description: Privy-based wallet connection flow allowing users to login with their crypto wallet and enter the world

features.name: 3D World Scene
features.description: Three.js/React Three Fiber based 3D visualization of the game world with infinite grid, agents, portals, and camera controls

features.name: Agent System
features.description: Autonomous agent entities with positions, movement, status tracking, and visual representation in the 3D world

features.name: Real-time Communication
features.description: WebSocket-based real-time sync between client and server for world state updates, agent movements, and chat messages

features.name: State Management
features.description: Zustand-based global state management for agents, events, messages, wallet balance, and world state

features.name: HUD Overlay
features.description: Game HUD with wallet balance dropdown, dark mode toggle, entity list, kernel output log, chat input, and camera controls

features.name: World Simulation Backend
features.description: Fastify-based backend server managing world state, agent simulation, database persistence, and API endpoints

features.name: Wallet Balance Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for fetching wallet balances and formatting addresses
